title: New: Lupa – Eyes Unclouded
body:
Over the past few months it’s been fascinating witnessing the musical development of **Lupa** aka Syndey’s Imogen Jones.

Still only fifteen years old, the last 12 weeks or so have been a real learning curve for her, with her music reaching a far wider audience than I’m sure she’d ever expected. Keeping up to date with her Facebook page, she regularly posts new music that she’s discovered, the likes of FKA Twigs, Alpine and Laurel; and what’s even more interesting is hearing it translate into her own music. New track _Eyes Unclouded_ is far and away her most ‘complete’ work to date, a swirling, almost Kate Bush-esque number, showing a lyrical maturity far beyond her modest years.
